item.title: 10 Barrows Trips A Dayo.o[Alot of pictures]
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

I use arcane-gano-arcane stream-sol-inf boots-seers ring for maging, first I do verac, then torag, then guthan, because those are the ones that don’t require prayer, before I start, I use vecna skull, ice blitz, killed in a few seconds, blood blitz if needed for hp, and once done start with the prayer brothers, I do dharok first so I can still use the vecnas effect to its last minute, then to ahrim, then kharil, then tunnel.

For cape I use fire cape and nezzy for both melee and magic combos, and regen (Cbf to do RFD), melee is only used for kharil and ahrim, which is fury, dfs, rapier, bandos tassets/chestplate, zerker ring

And it works good for me, I just bring pray pots, no food, as ss/blood blitz does that (Mostly blood blitz because it doesnt require prayer) and for ahrim and kharil I use their corresponding deflect prayers, turmoil, and protect item, not zerker pray though because I don’t use super/extremes. For maging prayers, Which I only use for dharok I use deflect melee, leech magic, and protect one item, not zerker for vecnas skull effect though because it runs out in a set amount of time so I thought it wouldnt effect it.
Usually get around 10+ runs before having to bank/restock

Read full topic

item.title: 10 Barrows Trips A Dayo.o[Alot of pictures]
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:28, topic:428304”]I would suggest the method I use, which is wearing melee gear (DFS, Guthan’s/Torag’s/Dharoks, etc) and using a Polypore Staff along with Ice spells. As long as you don’t care about potions, you can last a REALLY long time using this method. I’ve done 8 runs in one trip using this method, which is pretty good for me, normally doing 4-6 runs per trip :rolleyes:

Either method would work though. I only recommend the Polypore staff because it can hit a lot higher.[/quote]

that’s an interesting approach - it sounds plausible, although the accuracy of your spells seems somewhat questionable

Read full topic
item.source: 10 Barrows Trips A Dayo.o[Alot of pictures]

item.title: 10 Barrows Trips A Dayo.o[Alot of pictures]
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“Aff, post:27, topic:428304”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=530994.msg3879113#msg3879113 date=1325888688]

Let Aff be the example for the person who continues to spam after being asked not to.

i liked the taharok who thought his compiler was the shit

to say on-topic (so this post isn’t a complete bitch at taharok), do you only do one round per trip? each of your pictures shows no sign of the last trip - what are your stats/setup you’re using? i’m sure I could suggest a more efficient method
[/quote]Umm I do ten in a row, But yeah I was gonna record them instead and make a video…But I clicked to record and the client shut off lol. So I will try later tonight when I get done working.

a video isn’t worth the effort for barrows imo, but that’s just my opinion. however, judging by your trip pictures it DOES look like you bank between trips/rounds. It looks like you’re doing the black sally method, but I’m pretty sure you could last longer with slayer dart/something else. I understand that it comes down to personal judgement when deciding which method is best, but if you’re looking to maximize your chests/hr without using too many resources, slayer dart is a great way to go.[/quote]Normally I would agree, but Kracky has 93 magic, so there are better methods available to him

I would suggest the method I use, which is wearing melee gear (DFS, Guthan’s/Torag’s/Dharoks, etc) and using a Polypore Staff along with Ice spells. As long as you don’t care about potions, you can last a REALLY long time using this method. I’ve done 8 runs in one trip using this method, which is pretty good for me, normally doing 4-6 runs per trip :rolleyes:

Either method would work though. I only recommend the Polypore staff because it can hit a lot higher.

Read full topic

item.title: 10 Barrows Trips A Dayo.o[Alot of pictures]
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:26, topic:428304”][quote author=Aff link=topic=530994.msg3879111#msg3879111 date=1325888625]

Let Aff be the example for the person who continues to spam after being asked not to.

i liked the taharok who thought his compiler was the shit

to say on-topic (so this post isn’t a complete bitch at taharok), do you only do one round per trip? each of your pictures shows no sign of the last trip - what are your stats/setup you’re using? i’m sure I could suggest a more efficient method
[/quote]Umm I do ten in a row, But yeah I was gonna record them instead and make a video…But I clicked to record and the client shut off lol. So I will try later tonight when I get done working.[/quote]

a video isn’t worth the effort for barrows imo, but that’s just my opinion. however, judging by your trip pictures it DOES look like you bank between trips/rounds. It looks like you’re doing the black sally method, but I’m pretty sure you could last longer with slayer dart/something else. I understand that it comes down to personal judgement when deciding which method is best, but if you’re looking to maximize your chests/hr without using too many resources, slayer dart is a great way to go.

Read full topic
